snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta was in Kabul a day after a deadly suicide attack in Kandahar City and amid controversy over a NATO airstrike.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta arrives in Kabul, Afghanistan, a day after a deadly suicide attack in Kandahar City and amid controversy over a NATO airstrike in which Afghan officials say 18 women and children were killed.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan; Habib Zahori and Sangar Rahimi from Kabul; employees of The New York Times from Mazar-i-Sharif and Khost; and Gardiner Harris from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta was in Kabul a day after a deadly suicide attack in Kandahar City and amid controversy over a NATO airstrike.

headline.seo: Panetta Arrives in Afghanistan Amid Mounting Violence
headline.main: Panetta Visits Afghanistan Amid Mounting Violence
headline.print_headline: Panetta Visits Afghanistan Amid Tension Over Deaths
